definition: Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
handsome/good-looking
surname Yao
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 這張大牀是爲籃壇巨人姚明特製的。

sentences.english: Yao is the icon of China's basketball.
sentences.chinese: 姚明是中國籃球的代表人物。

sentences.english: Yao also is near the top of another, more unfortunate leaderboard.
sentences.chinese: 在另一個更令人遺憾的排行榜上，姚明也躋身前列。

sentences.english: Yao is familiared not only by the Chinese but also the people from America.
sentences.chinese: 姚明在中國和美國都是一個家戶喻曉的人物。

sentences.english: Yao oing is a famous Chinese basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 姚明是中國著名的籃球運動員。

sentences.english: Darvin had not seen Yao Ming up close for awhile.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文已經很久沒有這麼近距離的看見過姚明瞭。

sentences.english: What does the newspaper say about Yao Ming in yesterdays game?
sentences.chinese: 報紙上是怎麼報道姚明昨天的比賽的？

sentences.english: What is that like to see Yao carry the flag.
sentences.chinese: 你看到姚明在開幕式舉旗進場時感覺怎樣？

sentences.english: In the first quarter, he drove, scooped the ball left-handed under Yao's arms, off the glass and into the hoop.
sentences.chinese: 在第一節的時候在姚明面突破前來了個漂亮的上籃。

sentences.english: Tmac just said that this loss is because of Yao's absence, and I agree.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪只是說這次輸了是因爲姚明不在，我同意他說的。

sentences.english: Jeff Van Gundy has insisted that Yao's summer workload has not limited his growth.
sentences.chinese: JVG堅持說姚明的暑假作業並沒有限制他的成長。

sentences.english: Now they think of Yao Ming.
So far, no footballing Yao Mings have materialised.
sentences.chinese: 不過，到目前爲止，足球界的姚明還沒出現。

sentences.english: The " Yao factor" is already driving up prices for sponsorships and naming rights.
sentences.chinese: “姚明現象”已經令贊助費和冠名權身價大增。

sentences.english: Yao Ming had a great game last night. He scored 44 points.
sentences.chinese: 姚明在昨晚的比賽表現出色，獨得44分。

sentences.english: But on the plus side it was nice to see Yao abuse Bogut!
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面，能看到姚明虐博格特。

Sun Yue (1973-), PRC female pop star/Sun Yue (1985-), PRC basketball star

Jeremy Lin (1988-), Taiwanese-American professional basketball player (NBA)
to play ball/to play with a ball
Michael Jordan (1963-) US basketball player
Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
Gasol (name)/Pau Gasol (1980-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)/Marc Gasol (1985-), Spanish professional basketball player (NBA)
Jenny Lang Ping (1960-), Chinese volleyball player, coach of USA women's national team since 2005
